message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus gift worth $20 if you decide to purchase it. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
Thank you for the offer and the bonus gift. I believe in your confidence and will take the product off your hands.

However, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with the previous product I sold you, and I want to make it right. That's why I'm offering you this incredible deal. What do you say? Will you give me another chance?
